mch_guide.title: How to get WeChat Pay Merchant ID
mch_guide.step_2: 2、WeChat Pay Merchant ID can be viewed in the【Account Center - Merchant Information】of WeChat Pay Merchant Platform.
mch_guide.step_3: Note: If you are not a WeChat Pay merchant, you can click to become a merchant on the login page, register and apply for a WeChat Pay Merchant ID, fill in the enterprise related information such as营业执照、对公账户等, submit for review. After approval, you can get the WeChat Pay Merchant ID.

app_guide.title: How to get APPID
app_guide.step_1: 1、In the【Product Center - AppID Account Management】of WeChat Pay Merchant Platform, click “Associate APPID”, fill in the previously obtained public account or mini program APPID and confirm the association. Login to WeChat Open Platform, agree to the association in the message center.
app_guide.step_2:
2、Copy the associated APPID and fill it into the form. 

Note: If you have not associated any public account, you need to associate a public account first. Operation method: click to associate AppID
app_guide.step_3: Then login to WeChat Public Platform（{url}）, enter the public account background, get the developer ID（AppID） in the【Settings and Development - Basic Configuration】. If it is a mini program, you can get the mini program APPID in the mini program management background of WeChat Public Platform.

api_guide.title: How to get APIv3 Key
api_guide.step_1: 1、Login to WeChat Pay Merchant Platform, enter【Account Center - Account Settings - API Security】, click【APIv3 Key】
api_guide.step_2: 2、In the pop-up window, click “I have communicated”, input a 32-bit random key (containing numbers and uppercase and lowercase letters), click Get SMS Verification Code, input the verification code and click “Confirm”, then set successfully.

cert_guide.title: How to get Certificate
cert_guide.step_1: 1、Login to WeChat Pay Merchant Platform, enter【Account Center - Account Settings - API Security】, click【APIv3 Key】
cert_guide.step_2: 2、In the pop-up window, click “I have communicated”, input a 32-bit random key (containing numbers and uppercase and lowercase letters), click Get SMS Verification Code, input the verification code and click “Confirm”, then set successfully.

serial_guide.title: How to get Certificate Serial Number
serial_guide.step_1: 1、Login to WeChat Pay Merchant Platform, enter【Account Center - Account Settings - API Security】, click【APIv3 Key】

app_guide.title: How to get APPID

coze_cn.tip:
Go to Coze API - Authorization - Create New Application（{url}） 
Step 1: Create an OAuth application（"Client Type" is "Web Backend Application"）
Step 2: Fill in the "Redirect URL" as: {redirect_url} 
Step 3: Fill in {client_id} and {client_secret} in the form below. All permissions should be selected.
coze_cn.tip_1: Ensure you click 'Save' on the Coze side before clicking 'Confirm'

app_builder.tip:
Go to Baidu Cloud - App Builder（{url}） 
Step 1: Login and click "API Key" on the left navigation bar 
Step 2: Click "Create API Key"（"Service" select "AppBuilder", configure application resources as needed）
Step 3: Complete creation, copy the API Key and fill it in the form below.

53ai.tip:
Go to 53AI（{url}） 
Step 1: Login and click "Settings" on the left navigation bar 
Step 2: Click "Generate Secret Key" under "Enterprise Information" 
Step 3: After generation, copy the Sercet Key and fill it in the form below.

dify_agent_get_tip:
Go to Dify and login ({url}) 
Step 1: Select the intelligent agent to be accessed, click "Access API" 
Step 2: Copy "API Server" and "API Secret Key" in the upper right corner, and fill in the form below.
53ai_agent_get_tip:
Go to 53AI and login ({url}) 
 Step 1: Select the intelligent agent to be accessed, click "Access API" 
 Step 2: Copy "API Endpoint" 、 "Bot-Id" 和 "SECRET_KEY", and fill in the form below.
bailian_agent_get_tip:
Go to Alibaba Bailian and login ({ url })
 Step 1: Login Alibaba Bailian, select an application (or create one), click "Publish", get API-KEY, copy it below
 Step 2: Find the assistant/ part in the current URL of Alibaba Bailian, copy and paste it below
 Help: How to get APP ID and Workspace ID ({ help_url })
volcengine_agent_get_tip:
Go to Volcengine and login ({ url })
 Step 1: Login Volcengine, click "My App" in the system management 
 Step 2: Click "Create API Key", and fill in the form below after completion.
yuanqi_agent_get_tip:
Go to Tencent Yuanqi and login ({ url })
 Step 1: Login Tencent Yuanqi, go to my creation. 
 Step 2: Click the more button in the lower right corner of the intelligent agent card, click call API (new intelligent agent needs to wait for approval to have). 
 Step 3: Click copy intelligent agent ID, paste it below. 
 Step 4: Click copy Token, paste it below.
fastgpt_agent_get_tip:
Go to FastGPT and login ({ url })
 Step 1: Login FastGPT, click "Workspace" in the system management 
 Step 2: Click "API Key" in the system management 
 Step 3: Click "Create API Key", and fill in the form below after completion.

local_config_limited_desc: Due to the current system access being an internal network address ({url}), it is not possible to add/configure Coze intelligent agent, WeChat payment, and Alipay payment, which needs to be deployed to an address that can be accessed from the outside to configure.
